DOC.brief_summary: Unblinded, randomized, balanced trial comparing 12 month target lesion patency rates of the IDEV SUPERA VERITAS peripheral stent system to PTA in the treatment of obstructive atherosclerotic popliteal artery disease.
DOC.brief_title: Popliteal Artery of Treatment With Balloon Angioplasty vs. SUPERA VERITAS Peripheral Stent System
DOC.criteria: Subject has lifestyle limiting claudication or rest pain or at least a single de novo or restenotic popliteal artery lesion. Inteervention distal to the target lesion is required at the time of the index procedure or within 30 days after the index procedure.
